meanings.definition: A submersible vessel for exploring the depths of the ocean.
meanings.sent1: The bathyscaphe dove into the dark ocean depths.
meanings.sent2: Scientists used a bathyscaphe to study deep-sea creatures.
meanings.sent3: The bathyscaphe went so deep that it found a lost treasure chest.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a bathyscaphe, delving into the mysteries of the subconscious.
meanings.sent5: The bathyscaphe illuminated the hidden world beneath the waves.

meanings.definition: To descend to great depths in a bathyscaphe.
meanings.sent1: They bathyscaphed to the ocean floor to observe rare fish.
meanings.sent2: We will bathyscaphe tomorrow to explore the underwater caves.
meanings.sent3: He bathyscaphed so deep that he almost touched the seabed.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams bathyscaphe into the unknown, seeking answers.
meanings.sent5: The team decided to bathyscaphe down to uncover the ancient ruins.
